snippet: Music supervisors — the folks who help select the existing music used in film and television shows — have gathered in a guild and seek more recognition for their tone-setting work.
abstract: Guild of Music Supervisors, formed in 2011, is steadily growing in size as role of its members gains recognition; music supervisors, who help select existing songs for a film, view their work as being just as integral to a film as art direction or costume design; Oscar categories for music focus on original score and song, but not on found music.
lead_paragraph: Music supervisors — the folks who help select the existing music used in film and television shows — have gathered in a guild and seek more recognition for their tone-setting work.

headline.seo: Music Supervisors in Film Seek More Recognition
headline.main: Add a Song, Make a Movie
headline.print_headline: Add a Song, Make a Movie
